title: President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology

enrichment.summary: This executive order establishes the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology (PCAST), a group of experts who advise the President on science, technology, and innovation policy. The council is tasked with providing evidence-based advice on a wide range of issues affecting the economy, national security, public health, and equity, and will include members from outside the federal government as well as top science officials.
potential_concerns: The political appointment of non-federal members may lead to potential biases or a lack of diversity in viewpoints.
Security clearance requirements may limit the pool of experts able to contribute to classified discussions.
